#summary Seriality API

= Introduction =

The Seriality API is modeled lightly off of the serial libraries of [http://processing.org/reference/libraries/serial Processing] and [http://wiring.org.co/reference/libraries/Serial/index.html Wiring]/[http://arduino.cc/en/Reference/Serial Arduino] with some alterations to make it friendlier for Javascript.
